text: "Candy Shop" is a 2005 song by American rapper 50 Cent featuring American R&B; singer Olivia and is the second single from his second studio album The Massacre. It topped the single charts in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Switzerland and the United States. It went to the top ten in Australia, Canada, Denmark, France, Hungary, Ireland, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Scotland and the United Kingdom. The song was nominated for an Grammy Award in 2006 and was nominated for MTV Video Music Award in 2005. Category:2005 songs Category:50 Cent songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs
title: Candy Shop
